remarks: Exact degree of a difference of two polynomials of unequal degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
deg1addle.y $e |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
deg1addle.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
deg1addle.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
deg1suble.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
deg1suble.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` Y ) $.
deg1suble.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
deg1suble.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. B ) $.
deg1sub.l $e |- ( ph -> ( D ` G ) < ( D ` F ) ) $.
deg1sub $p |- ( ph -> ( D ` ( F .- G ) ) = ( D ` F ) ) $.
